ModMetaData.name: ED-PhotoDay
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 01.00.00
This mod functions as a reminder that will alert you on configurable in game hours and days. It is designed for people who want to take screenshots regularly to show the growth of their game, but can be configured to remind you of anything at that time. It can also be configured to take a screenshot automatically at that time.
You will need to configure it using the mod configuration menu included with HugsLib.
This mod Requires HugsLib to be installed and Enabled before it in the load order.
Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=18995
